name: Burgundy
startIntroPart1: From the splendour of the Dukes of Burgundy to the fertile lands of this illustrious region, the Burgundians rose to build a grandiose future.
startIntroPart2: Fertile lands and skilful diplomatic ties are the hallmarks of the Burgundians, a civilisation that seeks to flourish through culture and alliances in the complex world of Unciv.
declaringWar: With determination and pride in our Burgundian roots, we are forced to declare war to protect our interests and preserve our sovereignty.
attacked: We regret that the diplomatic route did not prevail, but we will resolutely defend our land and our people.
defeated: The Burgundians, though defeated, still proudly bear the burden of their history and will seek to rise like a phoenix from the ashes.
introduction: Greetings, potential friends. The people of Burgundy are reaching out in a spirit of cooperation and mutual exchange. May we establish fruitful relations for the good of our peoples.
hateNo: We are not agreeing to that!
afterPeace: Very well, all that fighting was getting boring anyway.
tradeRequest: We bestow you the honor of this trade offer.
